trans-unit.source: Returns information about errors encountered by the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInference"></xref> class while inferring a schema from an XML document.
trans-unit.target: Retorna informações sobre erros encontrados pelo <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInference"> </xref> classe ao inferir um esquema de um documento XML.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInferenceException"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInferenceException"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInferenceException"></xref> class with the error message specified.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInferenceException"> </xref> classe com a mensagem de erro especificada.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInferenceException"></xref> class with the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> and <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> objects specified that contain all the properties of the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInferenceException"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInferenceException"> </xref> classe com o <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> e <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>objetos especificados que contêm todas as propriedades do <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInferenceException"> </xref>.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called by derived class constructors to initialize state in this type.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor é chamado pelos construtores de classe derivada para inicializar o estado nesse tipo.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInferenceException"></xref> class with the error message specified and the original <xref:System.Exception> that caused the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInferenceException"></xref> specified.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInferenceException"> </xref> classe com a mensagem de erro especificada e original <xref:System.Exception>que causou o <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInferenceException"> </xref> especificado.</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Exception> object containing the original exception that caused the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInferenceException"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Exception>objeto que contém a exceção original que causou o <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInferenceException"> </xref>.</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInferenceException"></xref> class with the error message specified, the original <xref:System.Exception> that caused the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInferenceException"></xref> specified, and the line number and line position of the error in the XML document specified.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInferenceException"> </xref> classe com a mensagem de erro especificada, o original <xref:System.Exception>que causou o <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInferenceException"> </xref> especificado e o número e a linha de posição de linha do erro no documento XML especificado.</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Exception> object containing the original exception that caused the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInferenceException"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Exception>objeto que contém a exceção original que causou o <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInferenceException"> </xref>.</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: The line number in the XML document that caused the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInferenceException"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O número da linha no documento XML que causou a <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInferenceException"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The line position in the XML document that caused the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInferenceException"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A posição da linha no documento XML que causou a <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInferenceException"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Streams all the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInferenceException"></xref> object properties into the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object specified for the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> object specified.
trans-unit.target: Todos os fluxos da <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInferenceException"> </xref> propriedades do objeto a <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> objeto especificado para o <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>o objeto especificado.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>
